definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (mouse, cf. [[עַכְבָּר]], v. Gray:Prop. N. 93; [[עבבר]] OH and Ph. as n.pr.Lzb:304 (cf. also on simil. Lat. N.pr. Cl-Gann:JAs 1883, Fev.-Mk 128));—LXX Axobwr:
courtier of Josiah 2Ki 22:12, 2Ki 22:14, perh. also Je 26:22, Je 36:12 (cf. Gie and Ency. Bib.).
